title: Oudies Studios Crewneck (Burgundy)
body_html: Elevate your casual wardrobe with the Oudies Studios Grey Crewneck, a perfect blend of comfort and style. Made from soft, high-quality fabric, this crewneck offers a relaxed fit ideal for layering or wearing on its own. The striking red print on the front adds a bold pop of color, giving it an edgy, modern feel that stands out in all the right ways. Whether you're chilling at home, heading to the gym, or out with friends, this crewneck is designed for those who want to make a statement without saying a word.

title: Chrome Hearts Quarter Zip (Cocoa Gold)
body_html:
Meet the Chrome Hearts Embroidered Quarter Zip in cocoa gold – a color combo so rich, it’ll make your wardrobe look like a million bucks. This brown and gold masterpiece isn’t just a quarter zip; it’s a statement. With intricate embroidery that screams luxury, this piece takes your casual style to a whole new level of swag. The cocoa tones bring that perfect warm vibe, while the gold accents add just the right touch of flash.

A heads up: This piece runs small, so size up for that comfy, relaxed fit.

title: Livin' Lokal Crewneck (Dark Knight)
body_html:
Introducing the Dark Knight Livin' Lokal Crewneck – the crewneck that’s as bold as your midnight adventures. This all-black, sleek beauty is for those who prefer their style as dark as their coffee and their playlist. Made with premium, cozy fabric, it’s not just for looking cool – it's for feeling like a total boss while you’re out there living your best, local life. Whether you’re taking over the streets or just binge-watching your favorite show, this crewneck has got you covered (literally).

Pro tip: Size up if you’re in between sizes—this one's a little on the snug side.

title: Trademark Oudies Crewneck (Polar Blue)
body_html:
Item runs smaller than usual, make sure to order a size LARGER than you normally do at Oudies.

Hello navy, we finally became friends this year. Introducing the first-ever navy Trademark Oudies Crewneck, a piece so bold, so stunning, it might just stop winter in its tracks.

Creating this masterpiece wasn’t easy—no, it was an art form. The embroidery alone? We’re talking over 10,000 stitches, meticulously crafted just to give you that sharp, flawless look. Each stitch is a testament to the commitment and craftsmanship we pour into every piece. The colorway? A mix of deep navy and icy Polar Blue, so cold it’s practically frostbitten. You’ve never seen a combo like this. It’s like the first breath of winter hitting your face—crisp, powerful, and unforgettable.

This isn’t just another crewneck. It’s a statement, a tribute to the color of the season, and a nod to the timelessness of navy, with a twist so fresh it might just freeze you in your tracks. Wear it, and you’ll feel like you’ve stepped into a world where winter and style collide in the most epic way.

And now a testimonial from Malak, who modeled in this crewneck: "I’m honestly so OBSESSED, it might just be my new favorite."

The fit runs small, make sure to size up.

Female Model is 167cm, wearing size small.
Male model is 170cm, wearing size large.

title: Livin' Lokal Hoodie (Sonic Yellow)
body_html:
Make sure to size up for an oversized fit.

Featuring a striking graphic print in Electric Yellow on a deep navy base, this hoodie captures that perfect balance of energy & laid-back style.

This hoodie screams Sonic-speed energy with the kind of bold statement that says: “I’m running circles around you, and you’re lucky to be in the same lane.” Seriously, if this hoodie had a tagline, it’d be: “Gotta go fast”, because you're not wasting any time being ordinary.

This hoodie isn’t just for the speedsters. It’s for those who are too busy living their best lives to care about what anyone else thinks. The Livin' Lokal print, in all its high-contrast glory, is the perfect combo of vibrant yellow that’s impossible to ignore and navy that just clicks with it like Sonic and his rings. Just a heads-up—this hoodie runs fast (in a good way) but it does run a bit small, so size up if you want to cruise through the day in comfort and style, and maybe break a few speed limits along the way.

The perfect layering piece for any season, it's got everything you need: a spacious front pocket, a soft lined hood, and a modern cut that goes with just about everything.

Make a statement and show the world you're Livin' Lokal with this electric, head-turning hoodie.

Model is 170 cm, 64 kg, wearing size Medium.

title: Livin' Lokal Crewneck (Cocoa Brown)
body_html:
Item runs SMALLER than usual, make sure to order a size LARGER than you normally do at Oudies.

We see you. You’re scrolling through, wondering if you really need this all-brown crewneck. Here’s the thing: this crewneck wasn’t just made for you—it was made because of you. We’re talking about a garment so universally iconic, it could change your life… or maybe it won’t, but still—do you really want to risk not having it? This isn’t just a crewneck, it’s a way of life, the kind of cozy, elevated, "I’m way cooler than I give myself credit for" kind of vibe that you need in your life. And let’s be honest, your wardrobe could use some love, and this cocoa brown warmth is exactly the kind of embrace you’ve been craving.

Look, crewnecks are for everywhere. You can wear this to the store, to the gym, to a wedding (no one will question you—trust us), or just lounging on your couch acting like you're too cool for school. It's like the best friend of clothing: trusty, reliable, and always there when you need it. This isn’t just fabric, it’s the fabric of your future. You know how people always say, “You can’t buy happiness”? Well, they’re wrong. You can, and it looks like this Livin’ Lokal crewneck.

So, go ahead—SIZE UP (because you deserve that extra comfort), and watch how this one simple purchase might not change your life, but hey—it’ll definitely make your Instagram pics 10x better. If coffee & cocoa had a love child, it would be this cocoa-brown crewneck. Rich, warm, and your wardrobe's new favorite child. Cocoa brown isn't just a color, it's a lifestyle- literally be the stylish latte you were born to be.

Crafted from premium materials for all-day comfort, this rich Cocoa Brown crewneck is the perfect fusion of warmth and style, designed to complement any look, day or night. The Livin Lokal print, perfectly matched to the shade of the fabric, subtly elevates the aesthetic—creating a seamless, tonal look that’s as refined as it is laid-back.

Model is 173cm, wearing a size Medium.

title: Trademark Oudies Quarter Zip (Golden Green)
body_html:
Item runs SMALL, make sure to SIZE UP.

Ok Queen. (Or King.) We see you. This gold was made for you.

This green quarter zip isn’t just a piece of clothing—it’s a nod to the golden eras of style and royalty. With over 10,000 stitches bringing the Oudies Trademark logo to life in a rich green & gold colorway, it’s like wearing a crown without the weight. It’s the kind of design that makes you feel like you’ve just stepped out of a palace—but like, a super cool, modern palace. You know, the kind with exclusive VIP access and a red carpet leading to your closet.

The green & gold combo? Legendary icons rule their era with style & swagger. This quarter zip is the golden standard of streetwear—bold enough to make a statement but refined enough to make you feel like royalty. Whether you're claiming your throne or flexing at the afterparty, this hoodie is your crown, your kingdom, your legacy.

Crafted with precision, this rich green pullover is a statement piece, blending the classic appeal of minimalist design with a touch of undeniable luxury. Meticulous craftsmanship, fusing green and gold for a logo that pops with depth and elegance.

Just a heads-up—this one runs a bit snug, so size up to wear it like the true king or queen you are.


Model height is 172cm, wearing a size Small.

title: Livin' Lokal Hoodie (Cocoa Brown)
body_html:
Item runs SMALLER than usual, make sure to order a size LARGER than you normally do, especially if you want an oversized fit.

Guys, gals, coffee-lovers & latte addicts, and mainly anybody else who likes the color brown, this cocoa brown  masterpiece is made to fit  anyone who knows what’s good.

This cocoa brown hoodie is the lovechild of a cup of coffee & a hoodie. Picture it: a baby—but instead of a baby bottle, it’s sipping espresso & wearing the softest, coziest hoodie known to humankind. This isn’t just a hoodie; this is the hoodie that will get you a new friend at that coffee shop you go to every day & never talk to anyone (but they’ve definitely noticed you). They’ll finally come over and say, "Hey, I love that hoodie. Let's be best friends & surprise each-other with gifts from Oudies together forever" And just like that, you’ve got a new bestie and a lifetime supply of café chats & Oudies.

Embrace the understated elegance of the Livin' Lokal Cocoa Brown Hoodie, a piece that speaks to the quiet power of simplicity. Crafted from premium materials for all-day comfort, this rich Cocoa Brown hoodie is the perfect fusion of warmth & style, designed to complement any look, day or night. The Livin Lokal print, perfectly matched to the shade of the fabric, subtly elevates the aesthetic—creating a seamless, tonal look that’s as refined as it is laid-back.

With invisible branding, it’s all about what you feel, not what you show. Whether you're dressing it up or keeping it casual, the Livin Lokal Cocoa Brown Hoodie is the perfect addition to your collection. Wear it with pride, because this isn't just a color—this is your lifestyle.

Model is 170cm, wearing a size Medium.

title: Chrome Hearts Hoodie (Dark Knight)
body_html:
Item runs small, make sure to size up for an oversized fit.

Ever wondered what happens when you combine mysterious, luxury, and I-have-no-time-for-your-nonsense? Meet the Chrome Hearts Hoodie in the all new Dark Knight Colorway—the hoodie that looks like it’s always ready to save the world in a Batmobile. It’s all black—because why not? You know the vibe: I’m here, but I’m not here… until I walk in and everyone suddenly realizes they’ve made a huge mistake.

Step into the shadows with the Chrome Hearts Hoodie (Dark Knight)—where subtlety meets strength. Crafted entirely in deep black, this hoodie is a masterclass in monochrome design.The black-on-black embroidery? Yeah, that’s because you’re so cool, we figured your logo should be as quiet as your ability to crush it every day. The rich, tonal approach to the design ensures that this piece remains a statement, while still offering a level of sophistication that never needs to scream for attention.

This hoodie isn’t for the faint of heart. It’s for the ones who understand that being stealthy is an art form & comfort is everything. Wear it, and suddenly you’re a part of something bigger—like, “I might be saving the world, but first, let me grab a coffee.” Dark Knight? More like Dark Flex. Don’t just blend in. Be the shadow. 

The Dark Knight Hoodie combines unrivaled comfort with premium craftsmanship. A true testament to the Chrome Hearts legacy—where darkness, detail, and luxury coexist.

Model is 170cm, wearing a size Medium.

title: Chrome Heart Wide Leg Sweatpants (Frostbite)
body_html:
Make sure to order a size larger than you normally do, this specific item is shorter than normal.

Do you want to feel like you’ve been dipped in luxury but still be able to run to the store for snacks without looking like you’ve made bad life choices? Enter: the Chrome Hearts Sweatpants in the Frostbite color way. These navy wide-leg sweats are the exact level of chill you need in your life. 

These aren’t just sweatpants. These are THE Sweatpants—because why should anyone have to choose between staying warm & looking like they’ve got their life together? Answer: You don’t. In these wide-leg beauties, you can flex harder than your Wi-Fi signal while keeping it cooler than that one friend who always shows up late & still gets invited to everything.

These sweatpants are so cozy you might get addicted—wear them for 5 minutes, and suddenly it’s 2 AM and you’re still sitting on the couch ordering things off Oudies.com in your pajamas. They're so comfy, you’ll be thinking about them when you're sleeping in them, which you will, because trust us, they’re more addictive than your favorite app.

 And the best part? They’re flexing without flexing. They say, “Yeah, I’m wearing something sick, but I’m too cool to care.” Put these on, and you’ll feel like you’re walking on clouds made of expensive sneakers. They’re not just sweatpants. They’re a lifestyle. They’re Frostbite—because why just be “chill” when you can be icy?

Model is 170cm wearing size Small.

title: Livin' Lokal Puff Print Cuffed Sweatpants (All Navy)
body_html:
Sweatpants are true to size, make sure to order the same size you normally do.

The Livin' Lokal Navy Cuffed Sweatpants are here to make you question every other pair of sweatpants you’ve ever owned. We’re talking about navy-on-navy puff print that says Livin' Lokal—but don’t worry, it’s subtle enough that people will only notice how cool you are, not how hard you’re flexing. These are the sweatpants that don’t scream for attention, but somehow still get it. Just pure, unfiltered swag.

With a waistband stronger than your Wi-Fi connection (and a drawstring that actually works, like a miracle), these sweats know how to stay on your waist no matter how many tacos you eat. Back pocket? Yeah, for when you need to stash your phone, your keys, or your self-esteem after realizing your sweats are cooler than everyone else's. The cuffed ankles? Perfect for showing off those sneakers you’ve been dying to wear, while still keeping things effortlessly comfy. These aren’t just sweatpants—they’re a lifestyle.

Model is 174cm, wearing size Large.

title: Chrome Hearts Sweatpants Embroidered (Cocoa Gold)
body_html:
Sweatpants run shorter than normal, make sure to order a size LARGER than you normally do at Oudies.


Who needs a latte when you’ve got the Chrome Hearts Oudies Brown Wide Leg Sweatpants? These are so rich, you’ll feel like you’re wrapped in a warm cup of cocoa with a shot of pure luxury. The Cocoa Gold logo—crafted with over 6,000 stitches (yes, we counted)—is a seamless blend of brown and gold, making sure you look as smooth as your morning coffee. Wear these and you might start getting compliments like, "Are you made of cocoa? Because you’re melting my heart."

With a flexible waistband and drawstrings that actually work (surprise, right?), these sweatpants are the only thing standing between you and total relaxation. Throw on these bad boys and you’ll feel like you’re strolling through a chocolate factory with no worries, just vibes. The back pocket is there to hold your phone, your keys, or maybe even your dreams of owning every color of these sweatpants. They’re that good.

So forget the coffee shop run—just wear these and let the world know you’re the heart of the show. Cocoa? Check. Gold? Check. Comfort that’ll make you feel like you’re living in a chocolate-covered cloud? Oh, you bet.

Model is 170cm, wearing size Small.

title: Chrome Hearts Quarter Zip (Navy)
body_html:
Item runs SMALL, make sure to order a size LARGER than you normally do.

You know how they say Cole Palmer is so cold, the weather checks his forecast? Yeah, this Chrome Heart Quarter Zip (Frostbite) is that kind of chill. It’s navy, it’s icy, and the Frostbite embroidery in baby blue & white gives you that "I’m colder than everyone else—without even trying" look. Perfect for those cool-ish Egyptian evenings where it’s not quite winter, but definitely not summer. Call it the sweet spot where you can flex without sweating through your drip.

This quarter zip is heavy enough to give you that cozy, streetwear king feel, but light enough that you won’t be melting by the time the sun finally sets. The kind of piece you can throw on in the evening to keep it chill while still turning heads (because you’re cooler than the weather). But don’t forget—this one runs a bit smaller than usual, so size up to keep your chill just right without feeling like you’re in a sauna.

Model is 170cm, wearing size Small.

title: Chrome Hearts Quarter Zip (Red)
body_html:
ITEM RUNS SMALL, MAKE SURE TO SIZE UP, ORDER A LARGER SIZE THAN NORMAL.

They say some things are generational. The Chrome Hearts Heather Grey Quarter Zip? It’s the GOAT of quarter zips, no cap. With over 6,000 stitches in that iconic classic Oudies red, this isn’t just any sweatshirt—it’s a legacy. No gimmicks. No tricks. Just pure, unfiltered streetwear greatness. When they told us we were bringing back the classics, we weren’t kidding. This is the quarter zip your grandkids will still be flexing in 30 years.

Featuring a collar that says, “I’m here to impress, but I’m also super chill about it,” and the brand new silver zipper that matches the grey like they were made for each other—this is the piece to end all pieces. Think of it like that one line from The Godfather—“I’ll make you an offer you can’t refuse.” This quarter zip? Yeah, it’s the offer.

And, FYI, it does run small, so don’t be shy—SIZE UP. You’ll need the extra room for all the compliments that are about to come your way.

title: Chrome Hearts Quarter Zip (Dark Knight)
body_html:
ITEM RUNS SMALLER THAN NORMAL, MAKE SURE TO SIZE UP.

The Dark Knight? Oh, you mean the Chrome Hearts Quarter Zip that’s too cool for Gotham? This isn’t just any black quarter zip—this is the one that whispers, “I’m Batman” without saying a word. With black-on-black embroidery and the deepest shades of dark grey, it’s like you’ve been styled by the Batcave’s finest. Sleek, mysterious, and ready to take on whatever villainous errands life throws at you.

This quarter zip has the kind of cool that makes you think you're walking through a foggy alleyway in slow motion—except, you know, it’s way less dark & dangerous & just way more stylish. The collar? It’s your Bat-Signal, alerting everyone around you that they should probably step up their game.

Oh, and just a heads up—this piece does run a little small, so make sure to size up.

title: Icons Hoodie (Phantom Grey)
body_html:
Make sure to size up for an oversized fit.

Oh, hey there ICON. We're glad to see you here. Welcome to the greatest hoodie of your life. You're iconic, we know it, you know it, there's no point in being subtle about it anymore. This hoodie is for you. The IC*NS OF OUR TIME print in phantom grey isn’t just a design; it’s a reflection of what it means to live in the moment while leaving a mark on history. It’s the type of hoodie that lets you walk through time like you own it, because you do. You’re not just a part of the now—you’re shaping the future, one stitch at a time. It’s the kind of power that makes you think: “I’ll be back.” But unlike the movies, this is real, and you’re the star.

This hoodie is for the icons of today and the icons of tomorrow. The IC*NS OF OUR TIME print on the front and back isn’t just decoration—it’s a declaration. It’s for those who aren’t waiting for greatness to find them, but for those who know they make greatness, in every step, in every move. This hoodie is your canvas. It’s your legacy. It’s a statement that future generations will look back at and say, "That’s what it meant to be iconic."

And remember, it runs a little smaller than usual, so size up if you want to wear it with the confidence of the ones who will always be remembered.

title: Livin' Lokal Crewneck (Super Green)
body_html:
Item runs small, so make sure to size up for a relaxed or oversized fit.

Once upon a time, a diehard fan of Oudies, let’s call him Green Guy, challenged Ouda, our fearless founder, to create the ultimate all-green crewneck. Naturally, Ouda, who never backs down from a challenge, accepted. And so, after a journey that involved more green fabric than we ever thought was possible, the All Green Livin' Lokal Crewneck was born. Now, both you, the fan, & Ouda are all winners, and we’re all blessed to be living in this green dream.

This isn’t just any green, it’s the kind of green that’ll make you blend in with a tree like you’re part of a secret forest club. Planning to propose? You’ll look like a legend when you hand this over as a gift for your significant other who has serious green vibes. Going on a honeymoon? Why not take this beauty on the adventure of a lifetime? Get ready to be the most stylish couple in the jungle, because the super green crewneck is here to remind you that nature & fashion are one and the same.

This is magic, this is a green dream. A special thanks to that fan for pushing us to make something so rare and iconic, we’re glad Ouda accepted the challenge. “I’m proud to take on any challenge that brings something new to life," says Ouda, with a grin. And Eid the co-founder, always the realist, admitted, “I’m still shocked this whole thing even happened... but now I get to propose wearing an all-green Evergreen Livin’ Lokal Crewneck & I’m not sure what her answer will be, she’s 50/50 right now... but I’m pretty sure my odds will improve if I’m wearing Oudies."

Ouda, smiling with approval, added, “The odds are always in favor of whoever’s wearing Oudies. That’s just a fact."

Model is 170cm, wearing size Large.

title: Livin' Lokal Hoodie (Forest Kyoto)
body_html:
Item runs small, so we recommend ordering one size larger than usual for a relaxed or oversized fit.

Picture this: you’re sitting in the cinema, the lights dim, and the screen flickers to life. What’s on it? The FOREST KYOTO hoodie—a masterpiece that’s as rare as a film winning every single Oscar in one night. This isn’t just a hoodie; this is the red carpet event of streetwear. Grey meets green for the first time ever, a never-before-seen combo, that’s got us feeling like we’re premiering the next big thing in fashion. And guess what? It's only around for a limited time, so once the credits roll, it's gone. It’s like that movie you had to see before it left theaters—miss it, and you’ll be hearing about it for years.

If there were an Oscar for hoodies, this one would absolutely win it—and every other award they’re handing out that night, too. It's got the drama, the plot twists, and a color combo that’ll make everyone’s jaw drop. Get it while you can, because once this show’s over, you’ll be left wishing you had a second chance to grab it. FOREST KYOTO—coming soon to a wardrobe near you, but only for a limited time. Don’t miss your chance for the fashion blockbuster of the season.

Before you click add to shop, make sure to size UP, this is a blockbuster, and blockbusters are big, and basically yeah order a size bigger than normal.

Model is 170cm, wearing size Small.

title: Livin' Lokal Sweatpants (Shadow Grey)
body_html:
For a more relaxed & longer fit, we recommend ordering one size larger than you normally do, as these sweatpants have a slightly shorter length than normal.

Elevate your everyday comfort with the Livin' Lokal light heather grey sweatpants. Made from a soft, light heather grey fabric, these sweatpants offer a sophisticated, relaxed fit that's perfect for those who appreciate subtle luxury. The understated grey Livin' Lokal print adds a layer of depth, reflecting a modern approach to minimalist style.

Designed with an elastic waistband, adjustable drawstrings, and functional side pockets, these sweatpants are as practical as they are stylish. Whether you're unwinding at home or stepping out for errands, they seamlessly combine comfort and contemporary design, embodying the laid-back, yet refined spirit of Livin' Lokal.

Model is 170cm, wearing size Small.

title: Livin' Lokal Quarter Zip Puff Print (True Blue)
body_html:
This item runs big, make sure to order a size smaller than normal for the perfect fit.

Elevate your casual style with the Oudies Navy Quarter Zip featuring a bold navy-on-navy puff print of "Livin' Lokal" across the chest. Designed for comfort & effortless cool, this quarter zip offers a smooth, premium feel with a slightly relaxed fit that’s perfect for layering or wearing solo.

The puff print adds a subtle yet textured detail, making the "Livin' Lokal" graphic pop with depth against the rich navy fabric. A wardrobe staple with a touch of Oudies’ signature flair.

Model is 175 cm, wearing size Large Quarter Zip.

title: Trademark Oudies Crewneck (Chrome Grey)
body_html:
This crewneck runs small, so make sure to  order one size larger than your usual size for the perfect fit.

Once upon a time, a team of fashion geniuses (that’s us) sat around in a room, contemplating the meaning of life & how to make the perfect crewneck. After hours of deep thinking, one question echoed through the air: "What if we made a crewneck that was as smooth as a silver fox, but still had the soul of a classic?"

And so, the Trademark Heather Grey Oudies Crewneck was born. Made with a timeless grey base & extra fancy silver embroidery, it’s the kind of piece that says, “I’m laid-back, but I also have my life together.” The embroidery? Let’s just say it’s so detailed, even your grandma would ask how long it took to make (hint: a long time). But here’s the kicker: It’s so smooth, you might just get mistaken for an effortlessly cool movie character on a late-night walk—because yes, this crewneck is basically the plot twist we didn’t know we needed.

Oh, and did we mention that it’s perfect for both your "I’m chilling on a Sunday" look and your "I’m just casually out here running the world" vibe? Yeah. This one's a keeper.

Step into sleek, understated style with the Oudies Chrome Grey Crewneck. Featuring a premium heather grey fabric & a refined light silver embroidery, this crewneck blends comfort with a touch of modern elegance. The subtle shine of the embroidery against the soft, rich grey creates a unique, elevated look that’s perfect for any occasion.

Make sure to size up, as this piece runs small.

Model is 170 cm, 54kg, wearing size Small.

title: Cocoa Puff Oudies Crewneck
body_html:
Please make sure to size down, item runs slightly larger than normal. 

 

  • First-ever all-brown puff print design by Oudies
  • Soft, premium fabric for all-day comfort
  • Raised puff print logo for a unique, textured effect
  • Versatile, monochrome brown color that pairs with anything

Model is 175cm wearing a size medium crewneck and size large sweatpants.

title: Full Zip Hoodie (Brown)
body_html:
A fresh take on the classic hoodie. Our Full Zip Brown Hoodie features the exclusive Oudies Chrome Heart Patch, embroidered in a stunning gold and brown color combo that adds a touch of luxury to your everyday look. Designed for comfort and style, this hoodie is crafted with soft, premium fabric for that perfect cozy feel. The full zip design makes it versatile for layering, while the chrome heart patch brings an elevated twist that stands out without being flashy. Whether you’re dressing it up or down, this hoodie is your go-to for effortless style and undeniable comfort.

Model is 172 cm wearing size medium.

title: Quarter Zip Puff Print Livin' Lokal (Navy)
body_html:
Please make sure to size down, item runs larger than normal. 

The Livin' Lokal Puff Print Quarter Zip is a game-changer. It’s the first-ever navy quarter zip from Oudies, & the first time we’ve ever used puff print – making it a standout piece in every way. The bold, cream-ish Livin' Lokal puff print adds texture & attitude to this laid-back, slightly oversized design. We recommend ordering one size smaller than your usual as this item runs larger than normal.

Model is 175cm wearing a size medium quarter zip and size large sweatpants.

title: Quarter Zip Oudies Puff Print (Heather Grey)
body_html:
Quarter zip runs large, please make sure to order a size smaller than normal.

The Oudies Heather Grey Quarter Zip brings together clean, minimal design with a subtle touch of texture. Featuring the brand's signature puff print in matching grey, this quarter zip is all about understated style. The soft, heather grey fabric offers comfort, while the tone-on-tone puff print adds just the right amount of detail without overpowering the look.

Perfect for casual wear or as a sleek layer, this quarter zip is made from high-quality, breathable fabric that keeps you comfortable while keeping things simple. The half-zip design lets you adjust for comfort, making it ideal for any season.

Key Features:

  • All-grey design with matching grey puff print logo
  • Soft, premium fabric for all-day comfort
  • Quarter zip design for easy layering
  • Subtle puff print for a clean, minimalist finish

Male model is 172cm wearing size small sweatpants and size small quarter zip.

Female model is 175 cm wearing size medium quarter zip and size large sweatpants.

title: Cocoa Puff Sweatpants Wide Leg
body_html: Introducing the Relaxed Fit Brown Puff Print Oudies Sweatpants – your new favorite pair for comfort and effortless style. Crafted with a soft, cozy fabric, these sweatpants offer a relaxed, laid-back fit that’s perfect for all-day wear. The puff print Oudies logo on the leg adds a unique, textured detail that gives these sweatpants a modern edge. Whether you're lounging at home or out for a casual day, these brown sweatpants are designed to keep you comfortable while looking great. Pair them with a simple tee or hoodie for the ultimate chill look.

title: Sweatpants Oudies Puff Print (Heather Grey)
body_html:
Introducing the all-new Heather Grey Puff Print Oudies Sweatpants – your new go-to for ultimate comfort and style. Crafted with a relaxed fit for a laid-back look and feel, these sweatpants are all about cozy vibes. The soft, breathable fabric makes them perfect for all-day wear, whether you’re lounging at home or out on a casual errand. The puff print Oudies logo adds a unique touch of texture, giving these sweatpants a subtle yet standout detail. From their super cozy feel to their effortlessly cool design, these sweatpants are everything you need for comfort without sacrificing style. Trust us, once you try them, you won’t want to take them off.

Male model is wearing size small sweatpants and female model is wearing size large sweatpants.

title: Navy Livin' Lokal Puff Print Sweatpants
body_html:
Step into ultimate comfort with our Navy Livin Lokal Puff Print Sweatpants. Designed for a relaxed fit, these sweatpants combine the perfect balance of style and coziness. The bold Livin Lokal puff print adds a cool, textured touch in a soft cream color that pops against the deep navy fabric. Crafted for comfort, these sweatpants are ideal for laid-back days, whether you're chilling at home or out running errands. With a relaxed fit and breathable fabric, you'll experience comfort that lasts all day. The navy and cream color combo gives you a timeless, versatile look that pairs effortlessly with any hoodie or tee.

body_html:
The Record Time Navy Hoodie takes our brand’s commitment to speed and quality to the next level. Featuring the bold Made in Record Time graphic, this design is a tribute to our relentless drive to deliver excellence faster than anyone else. It’s more than just a slogan—it’s a reminder that we don’t just move fast, we move with purpose.

Made from premium Melton fabric, this hoodie offers superior warmth and comfort with a durable, high-quality feel. The deep navy color makes it versatile for any look, while the graphic stands as a statement of OUDIES' dedication to getting things done without compromise.

Wash carefully to preserve the graphic’s sharp detail. The Record Time Navy Hoodie isn’t just about looking good—it’s about living up to the speed and precision that define us.

title: Livin' Lokal Hoodie (Green)
body_html:
Item runs SMALL, make sure to SIZE UP.

This gold-and-green masterpiece is back after a couple hundred years of fan requests—so it’s basically a historical event. You’ve seen it before, maybe you’ve dreamt about it, but now it’s finally back. And guess what? It’ll be another few hundred years before you see it again, so grab it while you can.

Think of it as a limited-time treasure hunt, and you’re the lucky one who stumbled upon the map. If you miss out on this hoodie, you’ll be telling your grandkids about that one time you almost got it—and they’ll be like, “Grandma, that’s so 2025.” So size up, throw on the green and gold, and let the world know that you were here for the Livin’ Lokal legacy before it vanished again into the streets of time.

Finding a green and gold combo this iconic is like stumbling upon a unicorn riding a rainbow—it's practically impossible. But here at Oudies, we don’t just make clothes; we create rare, one-of-a-kind pieces that your wardrobe has been begging for. Why? Because we care about you—our people, our family. You asked for it, and we listened. This hoodie is practically a gift from us to you, a little piece of streetwear gold that says, “We love you, so here’s the dopest combo you’ll ever wear.” Green and gold? Yeah, we did that. And we did it because you deserve it. We care about your family, and you care about ours—that’s how this whole thing works. So wear it proudly—it’s a reminder that at Oudies, we make what you love because we love you right back.

Model is 168 cm, wearing a size Small.
